mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.content, p.like_count, m.mission_content AS mission_content, DATE_FORMAT(m.mission_date, '%m월 %d일') AS missionDate, m.mission_content AS missionContent, mt.theme_name AS pri_Theme_Name, st.theme_name AS sub_Theme_Name, e.emotion_name AS emotion_Name, c.companion_type AS companion_type, p.report_count, p.hidden_YN FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MISSION m ON p.mission_id = m.mission_id LEFT JOIN THEME mt ON m.pri_theme_id = mt.theme_id LEFT JOIN THEME st ON m.sub_theme_id = st.theme_id LEFT JOIN EMOTION e ON p.emotion_id = e.emotion_id LEFT JOIN COMPANION c ON p.companion_id = c.companion_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON p.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST ( content, like_count, mission_id, written_datetime, companion_id, emotion_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{content}, 0, (SELECT mission_id FROM MISSION WHERE mission_content = #{mission_content}), NOW(), #{companion_id}, #{emotion_id}, #{user_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.content, p.like_count, p.mission_id, p.written_datetime, p.emotion_id, p.user_id, p.companion_id, p.report_count, p.hidden_YN, mt.theme_name AS pri_theme_name, st.theme_name AS sub_theme_name FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MISSION m ON p.mission_id = m.mission_id LEFT JOIN THEME mt ON m.pri_theme_id = mt.theme_id LEFT JOIN THEME st ON m.sub_theme_id = st.theme_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET content = #{content}, mission_id = #{mission_id}, emotion_id = #{emotion_id}, companion_id = #{companion_id} WHERE post_id = #{post_id} AND user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, m.mission_content AS title, p.content, p.like_count, p.mission_id, p.written_datetime, u.nickname, m.mission_content AS missionContent, DATE_FORMAT(m.mission_date, '%m월 %d일') AS missionDate, mt.theme_name AS priThemeName, st.theme_name AS subThemeName, e.emotion_name AS emotionName, c.companion_type AS companionType FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MISSION m ON p.mission_id = m.mission_id LEFT JOIN THEME mt ON m.pri_theme_id = mt.theme_id LEFT JOIN THEME st ON m.sub_theme_id = st.theme_id LEFT JOIN EMOTION e ON p.emotion_id = e.emotion_id LEFT JOIN COMPANION c ON p.companion_id = c.companion_id LEFT JOIN USER u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE DAY(m.mission_date) = 1
